title: Finley Malloc
text: I’m a student and aspiring bioinformatician. I am currently pursuing a Master’s Degree in Quantitative and Computational Biology at the University of Trento, and have previously graduated in Bioinformatics at Sapienza University of Rome. Thanks for visiting, and I’d love to connect!
